title: Luxury Apartment in Downtown Houston
posting_body: For leasing info, call or text
Wake up and wind down amongst the luxury comforts of your downtown apartment.
Each residence comes adorned with quality finishes.
From stainless steel appliances to granite countertops, you will see uncompromising attention to detail.
Marvel at floor-to-ceiling windows that brighten the stylish layouts and step out onto private balconies that offer awe-inspiring views of downtown.
Residents wake up to the sweeping skyline landscape and fall asleep with twinkling city lights.
These apartment also offer a number of conveniences, including large closets and impressive kitchens with stainless steel appliances and granite countertops.
Here comfort, style and convenience merge for an inspired living experience.
- Uber Official Drop off & Pick up location
- Spectacular Movie Room with Theater Seating
- Indoor Pool Table & Regulation Sized Basketball Court
- 9th Floor Heated Swimming Pool with Sun Terrace & Lounges
- 24 Hour Business Lounge with Conference Room & Wi-Fi Terrace
- Open Air Custom Game Veranda with Ping Pong & Foosball Tables
- Grilling Stations & a Fire Pit with Panoramic Skyline Views of Houston
- Expansive 24-Hour Fitness Center with Strenght & Cardio Conditioning Equipment
- Within walking distance from Countless Restaurants & Bars, serving everything from upscale Cuisine
